title: Generative AI
content:
Foundation Models

  • Large Language Models: GPT, LLaMA, Claude
  • Multimodal Models: Text-to-image, text-to-video
  • Diffusion Models: Image and audio generation

Training Approaches

  • Self-supervised Learning: Pretraining on unlabeled data
  • Fine-tuning: Specializing models for specific tasks
  • RLHF: Reinforcement learning from human feedback

Key Papers from Your Collection

Implementation and analysis of significant generative AI papers from your reading list.
